topic.title: Process Limits
topic.shortdesc: The Linux operating system needs to be configured with several processes and files limit settings. The lines below should be added to the /etc/security/limits.conf file.

body.codeblock: hdfs - nofile 32768 mapred - nofile 32768 hbase - nofile 32768 hdfs - nproc 32768 mapred - nproc 32768 hbase â€“ nproc 32768
